parameters.content:
ADA - Bamboo: Telegram Chatbot @GovernCardanoBot Template

Product Introduction
ADA - Bamboo: Telegram Chatbot Template is a comprehensive, ready-to-use solution designed to help developers quickly build and deploy effective chatbots on the Telegram platform. This template provides a complete workflow, supporting the automation of user interactions, natural language processing (NLP), and seamless integration with modern AI tools.

With a flexible architecture and high customizability, chatbots developed from this template can intelligently receive and respond to messages, making them suitable for various purposes. These include customer service, personal virtual assistants, technical support, or creating engaging interactive experiences for marketing campaigns.

Development Team
ADA - Bamboo Team

Template Structure
The template is organized into clear functional sections, facilitating easy management and development:

- Command Functionality (Yellow): Focuses on processing commands from users such as /start, /help, /command, etc.
- Button Functionality (Blue): Handles actions triggered by buttons (callback queries) within the application interface.
- Koios API Integration (Purple): Processes button actions (callback queries) to connect with the Koios API, retrieving information about DReps, SPOs, and more.
- Automated Notifications (Green): Manages the sending of automated notifications to users and administrators.
- AI Question Answering (Red and Gray): Handles the function of answering user questions, connected to a local AI for analysis and accurate response generation.

parameters.content:
‚ú®Command /start‚ú®
üì• When the user sends the command /start to start using the chatbot:

üîé The system will perform the following checks:

‚úÖ If the user already has an account on the BBO system ‚Üí Allow to continue using immediately.

üÜï If the user is a new user ‚Üí The system will automatically create a new account on the BBO platform, using the basic information provided.

/help‚ú® ‚Äî Need help?
Send this command to get instructions on how to use the chatbot!
ü§ñ The chatbot will suggest common commands and how to use them to help you work faster and more efficiently!

‚ú® /find command ‚ú®
The system will suggest common questions, suitable for your needs to help you start a conversation more easily.

‚ú®Command /feedback ‚ú®
Displays syntax to help users write product reviews

‚ú® Command /f ‚ú®
Record user comments into the system and send notifications to the admin

parameters.query:
WITH question_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    session_id,
    LEAST(COUNT(*), 50) AS question_count
  FROM public.n8n_chat_histories
  WHERE DATE("CreatedOnUtc") = CURRENT_DATE
    AND message->>'type' = 'human'
  GROUP BY session_id
)
UPDATE bbo_user
SET point = point + qs.question_count
FROM question_stats qs
WHERE bbo_user.telegramid = qs.session_id::bigint;

parameters.content: ‚ú®Workflow to update user points: ‚ú®

parameters.query:
SELECT username, telegramid, point
FROM bbo_user
WHERE roleid <> 1
ORDER BY point DESC;

parameters.text: Sorry, you can't access deep chat mode! üö´ This mode is exclusively for users with Onchain admin roles on Cardano, such as DReps, SPOs, and Committee members. To enable it, please update your correct Onchain ID in the system. For example: - DRep: `drep17l6sywnxxxxxxxxswyrwvz3` - SPO: `pool155efqn9xxxxxxxxxxczg3asc` - Committee: `cc_hot1qvr7p6ms588xxxxhsq6ytv2` Thank you! üòä

Sau ƒë√¢y l√† nh·ªØng th√¥ng tin chi ti·∫øt m√† gi·ªù ƒë√¢y b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ nh·∫≠n ƒë∆∞·ª£c: * Danh s√°ch DRep: Nh·∫≠n danh s√°ch to√†n di·ªán v·ªÅ t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c DRep ƒëang ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông. * H·ªì s∆° DRep c√° nh√¢n c·ªßa b·∫°n: Truy c·∫≠p th√¥ng tin chi ti·∫øt c·ª• th·ªÉ v·ªÅ ID DRep, hi·ªáu su·∫•t v√† tr·∫°ng th√°i c·ªßa b·∫°n. * C∆° s·ªü c·ª≠ tri c·ªßa b·∫°n: Hi·ªÉu r√µ ai ƒëang ·ªßy quy·ªÅn cho b·∫°n v√† quy·ªÅn bi·ªÉu quy·∫øt c·ªßa h·ªç. ... ƒê·ªÉ b·∫Øt ƒë·∫ßu, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ th·ª≠ h·ªèi nh·ªØng c√¢u nh∆∞: "B·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ cho t√¥i xem danh s√°ch DRep hi·ªán t·∫°i kh√¥ng?" Welcome to the DRep deep chat mode! ‚ú® You're all set to explore DRep-specific information, powered by Koios APIs. Think of me as your personal DRep data assistant! Here's what you can now get detailed insights on: * DRep listings: Get a comprehensive list of all active DReps. * Your personal DRep profile: Access specific details about your DRep ID, performance, and status. * Your voter base: Understand who is delegating to you and their voting power. To get started, you can try asking things like: "Can you show me the current DRep list?" "What are the details for my DRep ID?" "Who has voted for my DRep?" I'm here to help you navigate the DRep landscape. What would you like to know first?

You have entered the SPO advanced chat mode! üéâ Now, you can easily query for detailed information about your Stake Pool. Try these questions: * My Stake Pool information: "Show me my pool details." or "What are my pool stats?" * List of pools: "List all active pools." or "Show me all registered SPOs." * Your delegators: "Who are my delegators?" or "Show me my pool's stakers." * Pool activity history: "What is my pool's performance history?" or "Show recent pool blocks." * Pool DRep information: "Who is my pool's DRep?" Try the above commands or let me know what pool information you are looking for!

=B·∫°n ƒë√£ chuy·ªÉn sang ch·∫ø ƒë·ªô tr√≤ chuy·ªán chuy√™n s√¢u d√†nh cho SPO! üéâ B√¢y gi·ªù, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ d·ªÖ d√†ng truy v·∫•n c√°c th√¥ng tin chi ti·∫øt v·ªÅ Stake Pool c·ªßa m√¨nh. H√£y th·ª≠ c√°c c√¢u l·ªánh tr√™n ho·∫∑c cho t√¥i bi·∫øt th√¥ng tin n√†o v·ªÅ pool m√† b·∫°n ƒëang t√¨m ki·∫øm nh√©!

=B·∫°n ƒë√£ chuy·ªÉn sang ch·∫ø ƒë·ªô tr√≤ chuy·ªán chuy√™n s√¢u d√†nh cho ·ª¶y ban (CC)! üéâ B√¢y gi·ªù, b·∫°n c√≥ th·ªÉ d·ªÖ d√†ng truy v·∫•n c√°c th√¥ng tin quan tr·ªçng li√™n quan ƒë·∫øn vai tr√≤ ·ª¶y ban c·ªßa m√¨nh. H√£y th·ª≠ nh·ªØng c√¢u h·ªèi sau: * Th√¥ng tin v·ªÅ ·ª¶y ban: "Show me Committee details." ho·∫∑c "What is the current CC status?" * Ho·∫°t ƒë·ªông c·ªßa ·ª¶y ban: "What are the latest CC actions?" ho·∫∑c "Show recent Committee votes." * C√°c ƒë·ªÅ xu·∫•t c·ªßa ·ª¶y ban: "List CC proposals." ho·∫∑c "Show active Committee proposals." * Th√¥ng tin th√†nh vi√™n ·ª¶y ban: "Who are the Committee members?" ho·∫∑c "List all CC members." SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN EXISTS (
      SELECT 1 FROM bbo_notification WHERE blocktime = '{{ $json.blockTime }}'
    ) 
    THEN false 
    ELSE true 
  END AS is_new;
